Name: Islington
Phrase: So, what exactly is this place called Iris Metro where you lived?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Iris Metro is the world directly below this Iris cloud. That's why the Metro world doesn't have skies as big as this one.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Then there's the Iris Metro's Divine Children. None have the power to clear the Mist or defeat monsters like Conductor-san. They only pray at the altar and make prophecies and divinations.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Did the Metro people know about us before?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oui, the stories of the existence of Iris Cloud has been talked about for quite a long time. Beyond the ceiling, there is another world called Iris Cloud.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: There's a lot of written literature about the Surface world. Additionally, Metro is dotted with special tunnels that seem to lead to some other world.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: We call them Metro Holes. But all the entrances to the tunnels are blocked. We can't go any further.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: These Metro Holes are treated as ancient ruins. Some of them are altars on which the Divine Children pray.

Name: Islington
Phrase: But for some reason a Metro Hole was opened. Otherwise, you wouldn't have come to this world.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Yes. After that Metro Hole appeared. The nightmarish Nachts began.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: The Nacht comes several times a day. The area is shrouded in a thick Mist and vicious demons appear from inside the Metro Hole...

Name: Islington
Phrase: What do you mean by a Nacht? Does it go completely dark when the Phantom Mist appears?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Day and night are not always regular in Iris Metro. The day/night changeover and weather conditions are quite different from what happens in Iris Cloud.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Because in Iris Metro there is no sky, moon or sun. The only thing that takes their place is the ceiling. It's not just the weather, even the brightness varies from place to place.

Name: Islington
Phrase: I see! So this world sounds like the basement of Iris Cloud, huh?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Exactly.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Yoshino-san, do you know about Metro by any chance?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Eh? Yoshino doesn't know anything about it. But it can be deduced after some thinking, maybe.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: You usually can't deduce that much from just that little information...

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Also, just call 'Yoshino'. I'm not old enough to be called Yoshino-san.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Then... Yoshino-chan?

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Um, that's fine.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: No, that's better♪

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Well, I'm surprised that Yoshino said something so precise about the celestial sphere...

Name: Islington
Phrase: Oh, not to worry. Yoshino is a genius.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: It is exactly what Yoshino just said. The ceiling of Iris Metro is dotted with light sources called celestial spheres. The brightness and weather changes depending on the area illuminated by these celestial spheres.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's like a lot of little suns hanging around? When they're glowing it's daytime, when they're out it's nighttime.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: That might be the easiest analogy to understand.

Name: Putra
Phrase: I see! That's how it works! I was so clueless before, but now I finally understand!

Name: Vivienne
Phrase: Me too! Thank you Yoshino! To be honest, I was worried that I was being left behind! You are indeed the industrial, little fox girl!

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Supposedly it would be easier to understand if you imagine it as indoor lighting.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Since the appearance of that abominable Metro Hole, the celestial spheres around it has been behaving strangely. The timing of the Nachts became erratic and we had to constantly monitor the Metro Hole...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: We never know when Nacht will come. And there can be several Nachts in a day. Us defenders have no time to rest. The demons were also quite formidable, so we were on the defense.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: The M. St. Iris Railway Knights and Allied Forces staying at the M. St. Iris garrison were all sent to the Metro Hole Defence Corps.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Most of the main forces are occupied, and other duties have been severely hampered.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: The longer it goes on, the more damage it will do. We need to strike the source as soon as possible.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oui. Miyako and I were a recon team together, gathering information inside the Metro Hole. Our job was to conduct investigations while fighting demons on the front line.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: So that means you people are the most relied upon force in the Metro Allies. You're like the SSS over here.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Yes. Although we do not have an official name, it is a special task force of the Metro Allies. We were all highly qualified military personnel drawn from the railway armies of various countries.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: When we went into the Metro Hole, everyone was all sent somewhere else...

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: You mean everyone was swallowed by the Phantom Mist?'

Name: Versailles
Phrase: No, no. We couldn't withstand the magic generated in the tunnel that opened and disappeared from the scene.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's possible that they've been returned to the entrance, but it's more likely that they've been thrown out somewhere else.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oui. But Miyako and I will find them. These girls are surely alive somewhere...

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Miss Versailles, I've been wondering. When you said M. St. Iris...?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I'm sorry, I haven't explained that either.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: There are five countries in Iris Metro - Metro St. Iris, Metro Nishiki, Metro Eisengrad, Metro Verforet, and Metro Flamarine.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Isn't that exactly the same as our world!?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: So it's the same here. It really is as the legends say.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: The people of Iris Metro know about Iris Cloud; The people of Iris Cloud know nothing about Iris Metro.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: That's strange. Is there a reason for that?

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: Surely you all can't believe all of this in its entirety, can you? I don't want to doubt you, but it's also possible that this is all just a setup that you came up with on the spot. It's a bit too good, or too convenient.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I understand what you say. I would say the same thing if I were in your shoes.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: I'll leave the final decision to Conductor and Islington, but you'll have to be a bit more persuasive. The fact remains that you two are still intruders.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: Dokan. Yoshino also votes for Yakky-tan's opinion.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: I have nothing to say in response.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: That's why I said we shouldn't force our way through...

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Our evidence is nowhere near as strong as it should be, but I have a world map of the Iris Metro. It's a complete map of the Iris Metro used by the Railway Knights.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Let's have a look then.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Go ahead. Compare it with the world of Iris Cloud.

The map presented to us depicted the five countries of the Iris Cloud. The location and topography of each country is almost identical to our world. However, the map also shows oceans outside of Flamarine.

Name: Yakutsk
Phrase: It's almost exactly the same as the map of Iris Cloud.

Name: Putra
Phrase: But there are also oceans in Nishiki and Eisengrad.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: That's a subterranean sea. Some researchers see them as subterranean lakes. No one has ever found an opposite shore in any of the countries' seas, so it's called a sea.

Name: Putra
Phrase: It's hard to do research on a boat.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Yeah. It's not easy to go out to sea, because we're blocked by thick Mist.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Then it's almost the same as the seas in our world.

Name: Yoshino
Phrase: It's not impossible that the Flamarine sea is also a large lake.

Name: Putra
Phrase: Ah, now that you put it that way, that makes sense.

Name: Mary
Phrase: The Iris Cloud world map only goes as far as the limit of human observation. There may be other continents, oceans and mountains.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Where is this Metro Hole you say you've been to?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Here. It appeared right next to the Railway Knights and the Allied garrison.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: This, on the Iris Cloud map... This is very close to our garrison here!

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oui, it's the same in the Metro World. It suddenly appeared near our base. Like a Phantom Mist.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: The monsters coming from there are as good, or even better than the ones we faced near the Giant Tree, even though it's right next to an important stronghold.

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Even now, our Metro allies are doing everything in their power to hold them back. They believe that we will bring them the Divine Child of Iris Cloud.

Name: Islington
Phrase: What do you think, Mr. Conductor?
The mysterious power of Gates exists in our world too. Mary here actually used this magic to move through space.
And there are Poison and foreign substances flowing into Iris Cloud from other worlds. It is quite possible that there are special tunnels leading to other places.

Name: Islington
Phrase: It would be nice if those Metro Holes were also lined with tracks.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: There are tracks.

Name: Islington
Phrase: How very convenient? You've walked the whole way, haven't you?

Name: Versailles
Phrase: We walked on the tracks. I saw it with my own eyes, I'm sure of it. There are tracks running through the Metro Hole. It probably extends from this garrison.

Name: Queensway
Phrase: Lady Islington, if everything she said is true, wouldn't it be possible to get to the Metro Hole using the Mist Train?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Well, true, but it's too risky to run the Train solely on the basis of what these two girls have told us. I mean, there's no excuse if something goes wrong, so I'm troubled...

Name: Islington
Phrase: Well, I'd like something definitive...

Name: Paddington
Phrase: Excuse me for the interruption! Sis, Conductor, we have an emergency!

Name: Islington
Phrase: Oh? What's the matter, my sister? Did you get a fork in your head again?

Name: Paddington
Phrase: No, sis. I have more important news!

Name: Paddington
Phrase: A mysterious tunnel has been discovered just outside the garrison. There was a thick Mist over the area, so it's possible that it may have appeared with the Phantom Mist!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: This is the Metro Hole. It's the tunnel that Versailles and I came through.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Do you believe me now?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Gah, there's no peace at all. Peace doesn't last long, eh?

Name: Mary
Phrase: What are you blabbing about? This is the 'something definitive' you asked for, right?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Well, yeah. Now we've got to go.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: You will help us with Iris Metro then?

Name: Islington
Phrase: Calm down. It's all too soon.

Name: Islington
Phrase: First, we'll investigate the Metro Hole. Then we'll assess the situation and decide what we're going to do. You'll be with us as key witnesses.

Name: Versailles
Phrase: Oui, milady!

Name: Miyako
Phrase: Thank you very much.

Name: Islington
Phrase: Messengers from Iris Metro. Welcome to Iris Cloud.
